name: PowerCenter:Use of "Sorted Input"
description:
List Mapping if less than X per cent of Joiner/Aggregator have "Sorted Input" property checked.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets containing objects without "Sorted Input" parameter checked
It provides the following information: 
Mapping or Mapplet full name, Percentage of number of items correct by the total number of objects in Mapping
rationale:
When Aggregator and Joiner use the "Sorted Input" functionality, when data is pre-sorted, performance could be drastically improved when sufficient real memory is available.
If "Sorted Input" property of the Joiner or Aggregator is not used, unnecessary sorting operations, with memory consumption, are performed, which could have a strong impact on Performance.
remediation: Check "Sorted Input" property for Aggregator and Joiner whenever possible, when data is pre-sorted.
total: Total number of Workflows, Worklets, Mappings and Mapplets having "Sorted input" transformations

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
